message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you get $30. It's best to settle now before inflation eats away at your share.
Let's split fairly. I get 60, you get 40. Inflation is coming, so don't wait!
Bob, inflation is hitting you hard! I'll be generous - I'll take $65, leaving you with $35.  It's better than what you'll get next round!
Alice, I know inflation is eating away at my share, but I'm not desperate yet! Let's meet in the middle - 55 for me, 45 for you. It's a fair deal considering the circumstances.
Bob, this is it. I'm offering you $40.  Inflation has already taken a bite, and it'll only get worse for you. Take this deal before you lose even more!
